compositeCheatsheet.name: Create a chart inside a report

taskGroup.name: Create a chart for a report
taskGroup.intro: In this cheatsheet will be explained how to insert a chart into a raport, that use its own dataset.

task.name: Create the dataset
task.intro: In this steps the dataset necessary to fill the chart will be created.
task.onCompletion: Now you have the dataset and you can proced with the chart.

task.name: Place the chart
task.intro: At this point you have all the prerequisites to insert the chart into the report.
task.onCompletion: Now the report has inside a chart and its dataset and you can execute the report.
